name: Alice
dialogue: Oh, guys, have you heard about this new music festival that's coming up? I'm totally stoked to go!

name: Eva
dialogue: That sounds like so much fun! I've been meaning to get out and enjoy some live music.

name: David
dialogue: Yeah, me too! I've always wanted to play my guitar at a festival. Maybe we could even start our own band!

name: Alice
dialogue: Ha! You're always coming up with crazy ideas,

name: Eva
dialogue: I think that's a great idea! We could call ourselves "The Cloud Chasers" or something like that.

name: David
dialogue: Love it! And we could have some amazing visual effects to go along with our music. Just imagine the lights and lasers...

name: Alice
dialogue: Whoa, you're really getting carried away now

name: Eva
dialogue: Yeah, let's make a plan to start rehearsing soon. We can even invite some friends to join in on the fun.

name: David
dialogue: Absolutely! And who knows, maybe we'll even get discovered and become famous!

name: Alice
dialogue: Okay, okay, let's not get ahead of ourselves. But it's always exciting to dream big, right?

name: Eva
dialogue: Exactly! And I'm sure our music would bring people together in a way that nothing else can.

name: David
dialogue: That's the beauty of art, isn't it? It has the power to unite and uplift us all.
